edu.cccnj.FivePoints.World

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cccnj.FivePoints.World.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The main loop of the program. Takes a list of Actors, wraps them in a TickManager, and makes them .act();

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller() 
      Controller(long tickDelay)
      The delay between each tick, in milliseconds Default: 1000

    • Method Summary

      Gets every Actor of a certain class type
      java.util.ArrayList<TickManager> getManagers(java.lang.Class classType)
      Gets every TickManager of a certain class type.
      void initialize()
      Initialize the controller with 3 Lanes, a CarSource, and a TrafficLight

      Remove the actor from the list of polled objects

        The delay between each tick, in milliseconds Default: 1000

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(int maxTicks)
        Run the controller. Optionally, run it for maxTicks amount of times only
        Parameters:
        maxTicks - How many ticks the controller should run for. -1 for infinite

      • simpleRun

        public void simpleRun()
        Run the Controller with the default maxTicks value (12)

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize the controller with 3 Lanes, a CarSource, and a TrafficLight

      • addActor

        public void addActor(Actor actor,
                     int tickEvery)
        Add an actor to the list of running actors.
        Parameters:
        actor - - The actor to add to the controller
        tickEvery - - How many ticks the actor should act (e.g, check for lights every how long?)

      • getManagers

        public java.util.ArrayList<TickManager> getManagers(java.lang.Class classType)
        Gets every TickManager of a certain class type.
        Parameters:
        classType - - the type of class to search for
        Returns:
        A list of all TickManagers of this type.

      • getActors

        public <T extends Actor> java.util.ArrayList<T> getActors(java.lang.Class classType)
        Gets every Actor of a certain class type
        Parameters:
        classType - The type of class to search for
        Returns:
        A list of all actors of this type

      • adjustManagers

        public void adjustManagers()
        Run some adjustments on the TickManagers. Currently it will: - Adjust the cycle time of Picky classes.

      • removeActor

        public void removeActor(Actor actor)
        Remove the actor from the list of polled objects
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor to remove
